body:
Hey, Avicus.

I haven't been very active in game, or on the forums very recently. I just figured hey, might as well stop in and see how everything's going. I see things are going fairly well, but I want to hear that from the Community.

So, how are you guys? Anything you want to talk about? 

Just trying to start up a little conversation.

Regards, -Jake

replies.body:
But are we so powerless as to be confined within the ruleset of a machine? Made to be the pinnacle of nature yet withheld from perfection by the arbitrary abstraction that is mathematics? You say I cannot divide by zero, but I say I can. You will say you do not accept it, but for that you can not accept the true nature of humanity.
You will never be one of the enlightened. You will never open the door of your mind.You will never get on the floor. You will never walk the dinosaur.

You will never be one of the enlightened. You will never open the door of your mind.You will never get on the floor. You will never walk the dinosaur.
